directions:
In a large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add poblano peppers and onion; cook and stir 4-6 minutes or until tender.

Stir in tomatoes, olives, garlic, pepper and salt. Bring to a boil. Adjust heat to maintain a gentle simmer. Add fillets. Cook, covered, 8-10 minutes or until fish just begins to flake easily with a fork. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve with lemon wedges and, if desired, bread.

html.directions:
In a large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add poblano peppers and onion; cook and stir 4-6 minutes or until tender.

Stir in tomatoes, olives, garlic, pepper and salt. Bring to a boil. Adjust heat to maintain a gentle simmer. Add fillets. Cook, covered, 8-10 minutes or until fish just begins to flake easily with a fork. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve with lemon wedges and, if desired, bread.
html.ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil 2 poblano peppers, finely chopped 1 small onion, finely chopped 1 can (14-1/2 ounces) fire-roasted diced tomatoes, undrained 1 can (14-1/2 ounces) no-salt-added diced tomatoes, undrained 1/4 cup chopped pitted green olives 3 garlic cloves, minced 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/8 teaspoon salt 4 halibut fillets (4 ounces each) 1/3 cup chopped fresh cilantro 4 lemon wedges Crusty whole grain bread, optional

ingredients:
1 tablespoon olive oil
2 poblano peppers, finely chopped
1 small onion, finely chopped
1 can (14-1/2 ounces) fire-roasted diced tomatoes, undrained
1 can (14-1/2 ounces) no-salt-added diced tomatoes, undrained
1/4 cup chopped pitted green olives
3 garlic cloves, minced
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1/8 teaspoon salt
4 halibut fillets (4 ounces each)
1/3 cup chopped fresh cilantro
4 lemon wedges
Crusty whole grain bread, optional
name: Tomato-Poached Halibut
nutritional_info:
Fat: 7g fat (1g saturated fat)
Calories: 224 calories
Sodium: 651mg sodium
Fiber: 4g fiber)
Carbohydrate: 17g carbohydrate (8g sugars
Cholesterol: 56mg cholesterol
Protein: 24g protein. Diabetic Exchanges: 3 lean meat
